overview: Beautiful Jesse Jane stars as a successful romance novelist whose passion filled books have made her a superstar. As she writes, she can see her creations come to life and the sexual seductions of her characters are hers to command. James Deen and his girlfriend Asa Akira have a hardcore make up sex session after a tiff, when James takes control of the situation. As Jesse runs into a writer's block she catches studly Erik Everhard taking a dip in her pool. Allowing the personality of her book's character "Candace" to take her over, she slips into a tiny bikini for a naughty afternoon romp. In the book's next chapter, Jesse envisions bad boy Manuel Ferrara in a fiery lust filled fuck scene with teen dream Kendall Karson. Manuel's next hook-up is with hottie Jessie Rogers who opens up her beautiful backside for a deep anal drilling. Jesse steps back into "Candace" for a feisty fling with James.
title: Romance
